data: The sound of the morning alarm rang out, four loud hard clear gong-clangs, and all over the great starship Valhalla the men of the Crew rolled out of their bunks to begin another day.
The sound of the morning alarm rang out, four loud hard clear gong-clangs, and all over the great starship _Valhalla_ the men of the Crew rolled out of their bunks to begin another day.
